name: Javascript - ES6 (ECMAScript)
description: Were moving to our new App! Live Code Editor, ES6 & ES7 features. Get it here:   https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.saravanakumar.javascriptplayground     ECMAScript 2015 (6th Edition) is the current version of the ECMAScript Language Specification standard. Commonly referred to as ES6, it defines the standard for the JavaScript implementation.  - ES6 Features contents with Easy and more examples.  - Easy navigation pages through right and left the tap on the screen.  - Easily read background colors and font styles.   We would love to hear any suggestions, questions or comments, please write into saravanakumargn@gmail.com. Thanks
